mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Canan, Samuel
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Kenton, Hardin Co., Ohio [Kenton, Hardin County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Canan, Samuel Patient Age: 18. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Incised wound left wrist. Also: incised wound of left foot and contusion of left side. Accidently. Location Wounded: Charlestown, VA [Charles Town, WV]. Date Wounded: 1864/02. Nature of Wound: axe. Result: Mustered out and discharged from service.
